title: :brilliant:

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Rate a player's night action with the following scale of ratings: :blunder: :mistake: :inaccuracy: :good: :excellent: :best: :great: :brilliant:

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host will then give their own opinion on the scale of your target's night action. If they agree with your rating, you kill the player.
- :miss: is an alternative rating where they do not take an action that is seemingly blatantly obvious to take.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

desc:
Post 4771
*After analyzing this move and looking into all possible moves that could happen in the future, I've determined that you fucking suck.*
